 2010-15062010-12-02OLD INAC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFirst Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act
SubjectCredit Enhancement Fund Use Regulations
PrecisCREDIT ENHANCEMENT FUND USE REGULATIONS, in order to enhance the First Nations Finance Authority's borrowing spread; it is meant to increase the debt reserve capacity of the First Nations Finance Authority in order to secure the highest possible credit rating at the outset.
